# Required Packages

* shiny
* shinydashboard
* caret
* tidyverse

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
```


# Run the Shiny app from your R studio

Use `shiny::runGitHub("ST558_project_3", "snprim", ref = "main", subdir = "Bayes")` to run the app in your Rstudio.
